2079110.name: Agent1218
2079110.description:
Story
Your start as Agent1218 a detective from Nira City one of the last cities still remaining after a cold frost covered the world many decades ago. After finding out information on a location about and ancient alien artifact. Agent1218 sets of in his vehicle and there he arrives at a compound that leads him to an underground Ancient Alien Temple. Once underground he Starts exploring and comes across many creatures in the dark that seem to be controlled by some unknown pathogen. Meanwhile the Viraks Company and their guards seem to be down in the underground ancient temple as well conducting researching.
2079110.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
